TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DsmlDirectoryIdentifier extends System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryIdentifier

Docs.summary: The DsmlDirectoryIdentifier class identifies an HTTP server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used to identify a server that provides DSML over SOAP/HTTP.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Uri serverUri) cil managed

Docs.param: A server represented as a <xref:System.Uri> object.
Docs.summary: The DsmlDirectoryIdentifier constructor creates an instance of the class using the specified parameter.
Docs.exception: is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
scheme is not http or https.

Docs.summary: The ServerUri property contains the <xref:System.Uri> of the server this object identifies.
Docs.value: The <xref:System.Uri> of the server this object identifies.
